name: You Are A Detective
description:
You are a detective. Suited up in a rumpled trenchcoat and battered hat, you wake up each morning in pursuit of the answer to a mystery you can't quite remember and the details of a trauma you can't quite forget.

Explore the branching paths, from the streets of a dark dream city to the coded messages hidden in bird songs, each exploration will loop you back to a new day, ready to continue the strange life of a detective.

Trigger Warnings for: Violence, blood, alcohol, drug paraphernalia,

Hints:

- Sometimes Re-exploring paths will open up new information

-Looping enough times will open up a way to end the game
